note:
My name is Marlon Parker, a Psychotrauma Survivor and Mental Health Enthusiast.

After losing my sanity, to psychotrauma, I miraculously regained it, luckily, living to tell the tale! Join me on this journey towards holistic wellbeing by subscribing to my Communities, below, for insightful, life-changing, discoveries. Let's rewrite the story of mental health, together!
